channel.title: Ok mod status if i get help
channel.description:
ive got everything i need( my no-ip my server is completed and everything)
and now im aware that i nee a javakit?
well here is what i currently have
1. no-ip address 2. server 3. a complete serrver 4. and anything else you get with the mopar thingy 5. testscape server
how do i get other peeps on my server?

item.title: Ok mod status if i get help
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

run server and make sure you have you no-ip running and your face online.

Read full topic
item.source: Ok mod status if i get help

item.title: Ok mod status if i get help
item.dc:creator: @kennyboy93 kennyboy93
item.description:
@kennyboy93 wrote:

  1. download the java development kit from http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp (i think) and install it

  2. goto control panel > system > advanced (tab) > evironmental variables
    and make sure there is a thing under user variables with:
    variable: “Path”
    value : “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_\bin”

without the quotes, of course
and if its not there, then put it there

  1. customise the server to whatever you want it to be (and make it good)

  2. get a few testers to test and give feedback

  3. repeat steps 3 & 4 till ppl really like your server

  4. advertise like crazy

  5. get a better internet connection when you realise that your current connection cant handle 40+ ppl

Read full topic
item.source: Ok mod status if i get help
